Tax_Description_EN: Standard customs duty applied on imported goods.
Tax_Description_SP: Derecho aduanero estándar aplicado a bienes importados.
Tax_Description_PT: Tarifa alfandegária padrão aplicada a bens importados.
Notes: On CIF Value of imported goods

Tax_Description_EN: Statistical fee charged on import declarations.
Tax_Description_SP: Tasa cobrada por declarar importaciones en aduana.
Tax_Description_PT: Taxa cobrada por declarar importações na alfândega.

Tax_Description_EN: 21% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA crédito del 21% aplicable a importaciones o compras.
Tax_Description_PT: Crédito de IVA de 21% aplicável a importações ou compras.

Tax_Description_EN: 10.5% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA crédito del 10,5% aplicable a importaciones o compras.
Tax_Description_PT: Crédito de IVA de 10,5% aplicável a importações ou compras.

Tax_Description_EN: Withholding tax on income from imports, already paid.
Tax_Description_SP: Retención de ganancias sobre importaciones ya pagada.
Tax_Description_PT: Retenção de imposto de renda sobre importações já paga.

Tax_Description_EN: 21% VAT charged on sales of goods or services.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA del 21% aplicado a ventas de bienes o servicios.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA de 21% cobrado em vendas de bens ou serviços.

Tax_Description_EN: 10.5% VAT charged on sales of goods or services.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA del 10,5% aplicado a ventas de bienes o servicios.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA de 10,5% cobrado em vendas de bens ou serviços.

Tax_Description_EN: Gross income tax applicable in Buenos Aires province.
Tax_Description_SP: Impuesto a los ingresos brutos en la provincia de Buenos Aires.
Tax_Description_PT: Imposto sobre receita bruta na província de Buenos Aires.

Tax_Description_EN: General import tax applied at customs entry.
Tax_Description_SP: Impuesto general de importación en aduanas.
Tax_Description_PT: Imposto geral de importação aplicado na alfândega.

Tax_Description_EN: Federal tax on industrialized imported products.
Tax_Description_SP: Impuesto federal a productos industrializados importados.
Tax_Description_PT: Imposto federal sobre produtos industrializados importados.

Tax_Description_EN: Federal contribution on imports to fund social programs.
Tax_Description_SP: Contribución federal sobre importaciones para programas sociales.
Tax_Description_PT: Contribuição federal sobre importações para programas sociais.

Tax_Description_EN: Federal contribution on imports for social security.
Tax_Description_SP: Contribución federal sobre importaciones para la seguridad social.
Tax_Description_PT: Contribuição federal sobre importações para previdência social.

Tax_Description_EN: State-level VAT on goods entering the state.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA estatal sobre productos que ingresan al estado.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA estadual sobre entrada de mercadorias no estado.

Tax_Description_EN: State-level VAT charged on goods sold.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA estatal cobrado en ventas dentro del estado.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA estadual cobrado nas vendas dentro do estado.

Tax_Description_EN: Federal contribution on sales for social programs.
Tax_Description_SP: Contribución federal sobre ventas para programas sociales.
Tax_Description_PT: Contribuição federal sobre vendas para programas sociais.

Tax_Description_EN: Federal contribution on sales for social security.
Tax_Description_SP: Contribución federal sobre ventas para seguridad social.
Tax_Description_PT: Contribuição federal sobre vendas para previdência social.

Tax_Description_EN: General import duty for goods entering the country.
Tax_Description_SP: Impuesto general aplicado a bienes importados.
Tax_Description_PT: Imposto geral aplicado a produtos importados.

Tax_Description_EN: Administrative fee for customs clearance processing.
Tax_Description_SP: Tasa administrativa para trámites de aduana.
Tax_Description_PT: Taxa administrativa para trâmites aduaneiros.
Notes: Placeholder fixed amount per import declaration

Tax_Description_EN: 16% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA acreditable del 16% en importaciones o compras.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA acreditável de 16% sobre compras ou importações.

Tax_Description_EN: 16% VAT charged on domestic sales.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA trasladado del 16% en ventas nacionales.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA repassado de 16% sobre vendas internas.

Tax_Description_EN: Customs duty based on the value of imported goods.
Tax_Description_SP: Derecho de aduana basado en el valor del producto.
Tax_Description_PT: Tarifa alfandegária com base no valor dos produtos.

Tax_Description_EN: 19% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA crédito fiscal del 19% aplicable a importaciones o compras.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA crédito fiscal de 19% sobre compras ou importações.

Tax_Description_EN: 19% VAT charged on domestic sales.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA débito fiscal del 19% aplicable a ventas.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA débito fiscal de 19% sobre vendas.

Tax_Description_EN: General customs duty charged at entry point.
Tax_Description_SP: Impuesto general de aduana en punto de ingreso.
Tax_Description_PT: Tarifa geral alfandegária cobrada na entrada.

Tax_Description_EN: 19% deductible VAT on imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA descontable del 19% sobre compras o importaciones.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA descontável de 19% sobre compras ou importações.

Tax_Description_EN: 19% VAT generated on sales of goods/services.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA generado del 19% sobre ventas de bienes o servicios.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA gerado de 19% sobre vendas de bens ou serviços.

Tax_Description_EN: Stamp tax on certain legal and financial documents.
Tax_Description_SP: Impuesto de timbre sobre documentos legales o financieros.
Tax_Description_PT: Imposto de selo sobre documentos legais ou financeiros.
Notes: On certain documents/contracts above a threshold

Tax_Description_EN: Value-based customs duties on imported goods.
Tax_Description_SP: Derechos aduaneros valorados sobre el valor del bien.
Tax_Description_PT: Tarifas aduaneiras baseadas no valor da mercadoria.

Tax_Description_EN: 18% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IGV crédito fiscal del 18% en importaciones o compras.
Tax_Description_PT: IGV crédito fiscal de 18% sobre importações ou compras.

Tax_Description_EN: 18% VAT charged on domestic sales of goods/services.
Tax_Description_SP: IGV débito fiscal del 18% en ventas nacionales.
Tax_Description_PT: IGV débito fiscal de 18% sobre vendas internas.

Tax_Description_EN: Ad valorem tariff on the value of imported goods.
Tax_Description_SP: Arancel ad valorem sobre valor de importación.
Tax_Description_PT: Tarifa ad valorem sobre o valor do produto importado.

Tax_Description_EN: Specific fund fee for imports (Fodinfa).
Tax_Description_SP: Tasa específica para fondo Fodinfa sobre importaciones.
Tax_Description_PT: Taxa específica Fodinfa aplicada em importações.

Tax_Description_EN: 12% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA crédito tributario del 12% sobre importaciones o compras.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA crédito tributário de 12% sobre importações ou compras.

Tax_Description_EN: 12% VAT charged on sales of goods/services.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA cobrado del 12% sobre ventas de bienes o servicios.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA cobrado de 12% sobre vendas internas.

Tax_Description_EN: Blended national tariff for imports.
Tax_Description_SP: Tasa arancelaria nacional integrada para importaciones.
Tax_Description_PT: Tarifa nacional integrada para importações.

Tax_Description_EN: 22% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA del 22% acreditado por compras o importaciones.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA de 22% creditado sobre compras ou importações.

Tax_Description_EN: 22% VAT charged on domestic sales.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA del 22% cobrado en ventas internas.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA de 22% cobrado em vendas locais.

Tax_Description_EN: 10% VAT charged on specific domestic sales.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA del 10% cobrado en ventas específicas.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA de 10% cobrado sobre vendas específicas.
Notes: Reduced rate for basic goods/construction (check applicability)

Tax_Description_EN: Internal tax on specific domestic products.
Tax_Description_SP: Impuesto interno a productos nacionales específicos.
Tax_Description_PT: Imposto interno sobre produtos nacionais específicos.

Tax_Description_EN: Import tariff applied to customs value of goods.
Tax_Description_SP: Impuesto arancelario aplicado al valor aduanero.
Tax_Description_PT: Tarifa alfandegária sobre o valor aduaneiro.

Tax_Description_EN: 13% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA crédito fiscal del 13% sobre compras o importaciones.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA crédito fiscal de 13% sobre importações ou compras.

Tax_Description_EN: 13% VAT charged on sales of goods/services.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA débito fiscal del 13% sobre ventas nacionales.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA débito fiscal de 13% sobre vendas nacionais.

Tax_Description_EN: 3% transaction tax applied to all economic activities.
Tax_Description_SP: Impuesto del 3% sobre transacciones económicas.
Tax_Description_PT: Imposto de 3% sobre transações econômicas.

Tax_Description_EN: Common external tariff under Mercosur or national rate.
Tax_Description_SP: Arancel externo común del Mercosur o tarifa nacional.
Tax_Description_PT: Tarifa externa comum do Mercosul ou nacional.

Tax_Description_EN: 10% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA crédito del 10% sobre compras o importaciones.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA crédito de 10% sobre compras ou importações.

Tax_Description_EN: 5% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA crédito del 5% sobre compras o importaciones.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA crédito de 5% sobre compras ou importações.

Tax_Description_EN: 10% VAT charged on domestic sales.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA débito del 10% sobre ventas nacionales.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA débito de 10% sobre vendas nacionais.

Tax_Description_EN: 5% VAT charged on domestic sales.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA débito del 5% sobre ventas nacionales.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA débito de 5% sobre vendas nacionais.

Tax_Description_EN: Tariffs applied to imported goods' customs value.
Tax_Description_SP: Derechos arancelarios sobre valor en aduana.
Tax_Description_PT: Tarifas aplicadas sobre o valor alfandegário.

Tax_Description_EN: 13% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA acreditable del 13% sobre compras o importaciones.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA acreditável de 13% sobre importações ou compras.

Tax_Description_EN: 13% VAT due on sales of goods/services.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA devengado del 13% en ventas nacionales.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA devido de 13% sobre vendas internas.

Tax_Description_EN: Stamp tax applied on specific fiscal documents.
Tax_Description_SP: Impuesto de timbre sobre documentos fiscales.
Tax_Description_PT: Imposto de selo fiscal sobre documentos.

Tax_Description_EN: Tariffs applied to imported goods' customs value.
Tax_Description_SP: Derechos arancelarios aplicados en aduana.
Tax_Description_PT: Tarifas alfandegárias aplicadas na importação.

Tax_Description_EN: 13% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA crédito fiscal del 13% sobre compras o importaciones.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA crédito fiscal de 13% sobre importações ou compras.

Tax_Description_EN: 13% VAT charged on domestic sales.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA débito fiscal del 13% sobre ventas nacionales.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA débito fiscal de 13% sobre vendas internas.

Tax_Description_SP: Derechos arancelarios aplicados al importar bienes.
Tax_Description_PT: Tarifas alfandegárias aplicadas à importação de bens.

Tax_Description_EN: 12% VAT credit applicable to imports or purchases.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA crédito fiscal del 12% sobre compras o importaciones.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA crédito fiscal de 12% sobre compras ou importações.

Tax_Description_EN: 12% VAT charged on domestic sales.
Tax_Description_SP: IVA débito fiscal del 12% sobre ventas nacionales.
Tax_Description_PT: IVA débito fiscal de 12% sobre vendas internas.
